name: iWriteMusic Data File
summary: Learn about .IWM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: IWM files are created when a user saves a composition with iWriteMusic. The file type allows users to save compositions, close them, then re-open them at a later time for further editing.
You can only open IWM files with iWriteMusic. If you receive an IWM file from an iWriteMusic user, ask them to instead export the composition as a .MIDI file, which is more widely supported.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
